description: Application for a non material amendment to provide the removal of combustible materials from external walls and replacement with non-combustible or of limited combustibility. All proposed materials and finishes to match existing with regard to the appearance (colour/texture/sizes) to the parent permission ref.  04/04860/FULM. The parent permission being for alterations and refurbishment of building currently under construction on the site with provision of training/resources at ground and mezzanine floor and the addition of one extra flat (to create a total of 23 units) and two car parking spaces.  Erection of a 5/7 storey building comprising basement and undercroft car parking for 116 cars, 3 retail units, library, community space, a landscaped courtyard with 83 flats on the upper levels consisting 23 x 1 bedroom and 60 x 2 bedroom units (resulting in an overall site total of 26 x 1 bedroom, 79 x 2 bedroom, 1 x 3 bedroom units and 140 car spaces)
